```{r}
library(dplyr)


data2 <- read.csv("data/data2.csv") %>%
  filter(YearStart == 2019, YearEnd == 2019,Topic == "Diabetes")
data <- read.csv("data/data.csv")

```
```{r}
colnames(data)
```

```{r}
library(stringr)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)

spatial_data <- st_read("data/shapes")
data$GEOID <- data$GEOID10
data$GEOID10 <- NULL
data$GEOID <- as.character(data$GEOID)
str(data$GEOID)
str(spatial_data$GEOID)
merged_data <- merge(spatial_data, data, by = "GEOID")


ggplot(merged_data) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = NatWalkInd))

```
